titles.title: Behold He's Coming In The Clouds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold He's coming in the clouds,
Do not fear but raise your voices loud.
Let your faith arise,
Even in the darkest skies.
For behold! He's coming in the clouds.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When your heart is filled with troubles,
And there's darkness everywhere,
When the sun's no longer shining,
And you're tempted to despair,
When the storm clouds start to gather,
And your hope is growing dim,
Just remember you're His child,
And put your faith and trust in Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When you find yourself afflicted,
And your body's racked with pain,
And you've lost all sense of comfort,
Another day's not there to gain,
When you've run the race with patience,
But fiery trials seem not to wain,
Just remember you're His child,
And put your faith and trust in Him.
